tools.name: ingest_document
tools.description:
Ingests a physics document (PDF or text), extracts knowledge,
    and updates the server's knowledge base.

tools.name: list_documents_resource
tools.description: Lists all documents currently processed into the knowledge base.

tools.name: list_equations_resource
tools.description: Lists all equations currently in the knowledge base.

tools.name: get_equation_resource
tools.description: Provides the details of a specific equation by its ID.

tools.name: list_concepts_resource
tools.description: Lists all concepts (and definitions) currently in the knowledge base.

tools.name: get_concept_resource
tools.description: Provides the details of a specific concept by its ID.

tools.name: solve_physics_problem
tools.description:
Solves a given physics problem using the internal knowledge base,
    symbolic math (conceptually), and LLM reasoning.
